name: Lentil Salad with Spinach and Pomegranate
description: This vegan lentil salad with spinach, pomegranate, avocado, and walnuts is super delicious and packed with nutrients. Perfect for fall!
recipeIngredient: 3 cups cooked brown lentils (I usually cook them the night before. Or if you like you can also use canned lentils. )
2 small apples, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the lentils according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the lentils according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the pomegranate into halves and remove the seeds. I like to do this in a bowl of water because then it doesn't get all messy. Fill a large bowl with water.  Place halved pomegranate into the water. Use your fingers to break the seeds out. Remove the white fiber that floats at the top of the water.
